text:
Според мен с тези суми цитираш две плащания /проложени/:

EFKA /данък/ 1554 ЕВРО

Великденска заплата 1565 ЕВРО

 

Поздрави,

Елена Ковачки

Ръководител „Администрация и Бек Офис“

Отдел „Търговия с природен газ“

Моб: +359 893 659 834

www.tibiel.com <http://www.tibiel.com> 

ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД



 



 

From: ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД <tbl_ood@abv.bg> 
Sent: Thursday, June 20, 2024 2:31 PM
To: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>
Subject: Re: FW: payment

 

Здравей, 

за плащането на 10.04.2024 - 3840,80 евро как е формирано.

Ако е данък за м.01.2024 при мен  по фиш за заплата е 3862.76 евро.

Хубав ден!



>-------- Оригинално писмо -------- 
>От: Backoffice Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com>  
>Относно: FW: payment 
>До: ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД <tbl_ood@abv.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@abv.bg> > 
>Изпратено на: 20.06.2024 11:47 

Плащане, отнасяюо се до допълнителен данък за платени услуги съгласно Закон 4172/2013 за месец февруари, който включва;

месечната заплата за Танасиоц Каранцис

Месечна заплата за  Танасиос Константопулос /предишния управител, който напусна/

и неговия данък за финансовата великденската добавка

 

Поздрави,

Елена Ковачки

Ръководител „Администрация и Бек Офис“

Отдел „Търговия с природен газ“

Моб: +359 893 659 834

www.tibiel.com <http://www.tibiel.com> 

ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД



 



 

From: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com <mailto:akarantzis@tibiel.com> > 
Sent: Thursday, June 20, 2024 11:40 AM
To: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> >
Subject: RE: payment

 

Dear Elena, 

 

Sorry for the confusion this is not an EFKA payment!

 

The document you provided, the payment refers to an additional tax for salaried services under Law 4172/2013 for the month of Ferbruary, which includes mine and Mr. Konstantopoulos monthly salary and his Easter gift tax.

 

Best regards,

Thanasis

 

 

From: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <javascript:%20internSendMess('Backoffice@tibiel.com')> > 
Sent: Thursday, June 20, 2024 10:52 AM
To: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com <javascript:%20internSendMess('akarantzis@tibiel.com')> >
Subject: FW: payment

 

We are still confusing with the subject of the payment.

 

Could you, please explain in detail without abbreviations

 

Kindly Regards,

Elena Kovachki

Administration & Back office Manager

Natural Gas Trading Department

Mob: +359 893 659 834

www.tibiel.com/en <http://www.tibiel.com/en> 

Tibiel L.t.d.

 <https://img.abv.bg/ns_test/1/i/bi.gif> 

 <https://img.abv.bg/ns_test/1/i/bi.gif> 

 

From: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com <javascript:%20internSendMess('akarantzis@tibiel.com')> > 
Sent: Thursday, June 20, 2024 10:44 AM
To: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <javascript:%20internSendMess('Backoffice@tibiel.com')> >
Subject: FW: payment

 

Dear Elena, 

 

The receiver of the payment is the Greek Gov. As far as I understand from the title of the pdf file, these are the obligation of February.

 

Back then Mr. Konstantopoulos was still an employee of our company so his EFKA obligations are also included on this FMY.

 

Best regards,

Thanasis

 

 

Athanasios Karantzis  

Head of Supply and Gas Trading  of TIBIEL EOOD in Greece

M:+30 697 9073017 P: +30 216 0702506

E-mail: akarantzis@tibiel.com <javascript:%20internSendMess('akarantzis@tibiel.com')> 



 

 

 

 

From: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <javascript:%20internSendMess('Backoffice@tibiel.com')> > 
Sent: Thursday, June 20, 2024 10:38 AM
To: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com <javascript:%20internSendMess('akarantzis@tibiel.com')> >
Subject: payment

 

Dear Thanasis,

 

Could you please help me with clarifying the purpose and the receiver for this payment to who is.

 

I am asking on behalf of our accountants

 

Kindly Regards,

Elena Kovachki

Administration & Back office Manager

Natural Gas Trading Department

Mob: +359 893 659 834

www.tibiel.com/en <http://www.tibiel.com/en> 

Tibiel L.t.d.

 <https://img.abv.bg/ns_test/1/i/bi.gif> 

 <https://img.abv.bg/ns_test/1/i/bi.gif>
